text: The 1994 Vuelta a España was the 49th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Valladolid, with an individual time trial on 25 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 5 May with a stage to Cerler. The race finished in Madrid on 15 May. ==Stage 1== 25 April 1994 — Valladolid to Valladolid, (ITT) {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
